dos: Eat fiber-rich vegetables like bitter gourd, spinach, and drumsticks.
Include legumes like chickpeas and lentils in meals.
donts: Avoid high-sugar fruits like mangoes and custard apples.
Limit consumption of rice; prefer brown rice or millets.

dos: Consume leafy greens and vegetables like mustard greens and bamboo shoots.

donts: Avoid high-carb traditional foods like thukpa made with regular noodles.
Steer clear of sugary beverages.
